name: The Golden Boy Online Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Josh Foley.

	Joshua Foley was first seen as part of the anti-mutant group known as the Reavers. His power to heal displayed itself when he healed a mortally wounded friend.

questions.text: The first girl Elixir healed was his friend Laurie Collins.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Laurie's codename was Wallflower, and she had the ability to produce pheromones and to cause people to go to sleep. She was killed by a sniper's bullet.

questions.text: When Elixir first joined Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters, whom did he room with?
questions.explanation:
Prodigy.

	Prodigy is a mutant who can temporarily absorb the intellect of others. He has lost his powers due to the effects of the House of M event.

questions.text: With whom does Elixir share a kiss while playing pool in a bar?
questions.explanation:
Wolfsbane.

	Rahne Sinclair is Wolfsbane, depowered due to the House of M event. She kisses Elixir, letting out her base instincts. She loses control of herself however, and slashes him across the face.

questions.text: After being injured by another mutant, Elixir was able to heal himself. What color did he change his skin and hair?
questions.explanation:
Gold.

	Danielle Moonstar theorizes that this came about as a result of Elixir's desire to be "the golden boy". Elixir's skin later goes black when he kills Reverend Stryker.

questions.text: Elixir's skin turns black when he kills Donald Pierce.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Elixir killed the anti-mutant Reverend William Stryker, not the cyborg Donald Pierce. One of Stryker's snipers killed Elixir's friend and romantic interest Wallflower.

Danielle Moonstar.

	Danielle Moonstar has limited telepathic powers and power over psionic energy. She can also create illusions. A former member of X-Force, she now is a mentor to younger students.

questions.text: Elixir heals X-23 when she is mortally wounded in the battle with Nimrod.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Josh was depressed after killing Stryker, and it was only after his friend Julian talked some sense into him that he was able to heal X-23. His skin resumed the golden color as a result.

questions.text: In the "House of M" timeline, with whom does Elixir work?
questions.explanation:
Wither.

	Wither and Elixir are charged with forcibly interrogating Cameron Hodge. Wither uses his power to rapidly kill body tissue and Elixir heals it, a painful process for the victim.

Biokinesis.

	Elixir can rearrange the molecules of himself and other people he is in close proximity to. While he uses this mainly for healing purposes, he can also cause great damage with this power. His power only affects organic material.
